name: Samsung Smart tv
description: Step up from Full HD with the clarity of the UN55NU6900. Get 4X the resolution of Full HD, plus non-4K TV content is upscaled to 4K via a powerful UHD Engine. This TV is a clear upgrade for your content. Motion Rate 240 (120Hz refresh rate)

name: Samsung Soundbar
description: A wireless subwoofer delivers powerful low-end bass to enhance movies and songs, while a game mode enhances sound effects in your favorite games.It has six speakers with a dedicated center channel to provide crisp, clear dialog.

name: Playstation 4 Pro
description: Support for faster frame rates delivers super-sharp action for select PS4 games. One unified gaming community. With up to 4K streaming and 4K auto-upscaling for video content. Performance capable of 4K gaming and HDR.

name: iPhone 8 with 64GB
description: The Apple iPhone 8 is a new generation of iPhone. Updated features include a new design, improved camera, and the A11 Bionic chip with four efficiency cores and two performance cores for fast performance. Faster A11 processor.

name: DJI - Mavic 2 Pro
description: It has a powerful 1-inch CMOS sensor to capture 20-megapixel 4K images and an adjustable-aperture lens for clear footage in various lighting situations. This DJI Mavic 2 Pro aircraft has 8GB of internal storage and supports microSD cards up to 128GB.

name: Echo Smart Alarm
description: Echo Spot is designed to fit anywhere in your home. Use 2nd generation far-field voice recognition to watch the news, see music lyrics, weather forecasts, to-do and shopping lists, browse and listen to Audible audiobooks, and more.

name: Gamer Processor
description: Get the most out of your computing experience with the CYBERPOWERPC Gamer Ultra series of computers. These desktops feature powerful AMD multi-core processors to not only handle your intense gaming sessions.

name: Dell HD Computer
description: The display of  this computer is 15.6 inches. It has a HD Widescreen LED-backlit and a Processor of AMD Ryzen 5 2500U Quad-Core with RAM: 8GB DDR4 Memory and a hard drive of 1TB HDD. The Graphics: AMD Radeon Vega 8 Mobile Graphics

name: JBL - Headphones
description: Enjoy the adaptable, intuitive design of these versatile wireless headphones. The flexible neckband maintains a strong, comfortable fit during workouts or workdays, while the JBL-engineered hardware delivers crisp, rich audio.

name: Canon - EOS Rebel
description: Take stunning pictures with vibrant colors using this EOS Rebel T7 camera. The built-in Wi-Fi makes printing and sharing pictures quick and easy, and the auto-focus system creates crisp images at a moment's notice. Optical Sensor Size. 15.1 x 22.7 mm.

name: 11-Inch iPad Pro
description: The new 11-inch iPad Pro features an advanced Liquid Retina display that goes edge to edge.ยน Face ID, so you can securely unlock iPad Pro, log in to apps, and pay with just a glance. Edge-to-edge display without Home button.

name: Apple Watch
description: Fundamentally redesigned and reengineered. The largest Apple Watch display yet. Built-in electrical heart sensor. Low and high heart rate notifications. Fall detection and Emergency SOS. New Breathe watch faces.
